title: Work-energy theorem - comparing two F-x graphs

content.question: Which of the following statements comparing <math alttext="v sub A" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub></math> to <math alttext="v sub B" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></math>, and comparing <math alttext="m sub A" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub></math> to <math alttext="m sub B" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>m</mi> <mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi> </msub> </math> must be true?

choices.label: If <math alttext="v sub A equals v sub B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="m sub A equals m sub B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>.

If <math alttext="v sub A equals v sub B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="m sub A is greater than m sub B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>.

If <math alttext="v sub A is greater than v sub B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="m sub A is greater than m sub B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>.

If <math alttext="v sub A is greater than v sub B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="m sub A is less than m sub B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: If <math alttext="v sub A is greater than v sub B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="m sub A is less than m sub B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
